descriptionHtml: BerryHunter will follow a "Game-as-an-Event" release model. That means while the server should mostly be online, support and maintenance can only be expected during communicated events like the current Playtest.
That also means the game will change and evolve from event to event - while the state in-between is not guaranteed in any way.

As you find bugs or have suggestions for the game,
let us know via our social media channels on the right.
Thank you very much for playing this early version of our game!

changes.description: Animals won't randomly become invisible to you.
Attack and action animations are not longer broken.
Damage overlay could become stuck until you reloaded the game. This should be fixed.
Mammoth and tiger damage areas are now more forgiving, making it easier to hit them without being hit.
Game doesn't freeze anymore when you sent an overly long chat message. In fact chat messages are now capped to 120 characters.
When you now click outside of the chat window, the game will continue as expected.
Headlines (on the start screen) could become ginormous on wide-screens. Not anymore!
Highscores (at the top of the screen) will now update when opening the scoreboards.
The rate+feedback form was broken. As it is still not fixed, we decided to remove it for now to not lose your valuable feedback into the aether.
Updated the credits with the latest changes to the team.
